Equipment Actions.Action 1: Fist, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 8 Bludgeoning plus 7 Poison

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Myconid uses either Hallucination Spores or its Pacifying Spores, then makes a Fist attack
Other Actions.Action 2: Animating Spores, The Myconid targets a corpse and unleasehes spores.  The corpse rises as a Spore Servant until the spores expire or is destroyed
Other Actions.Action 3: Hallucination Spores, The Myconid ejects spores at a creature that can incapacitate them and cause them to hallucinate
Other Actions.Action 4: Pacifying Spores, The Myconid ejects spores at a creature that can stun them
Other Actions.Action 5: Rapport Spores, The Myconid expels spores around it.  Infected creatures can speak telepathically with each other

Abilities.Ability 1: Distress Spore, The Myconid shares its pain with all other nearby Myconids
Abilities.Ability 2: Sun Sickness, The Myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls and saving throws while in sunlight.  It will die after spending an hour or more in direct sunlight
